definition: to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]

sentences.english: Eventually, a man drove us in his own car to safety.
sentences.chinese: 最后，一名男子开车把我们载到安全之地。

sentences.english: A file system must be unmounted to be reformatted.
sentences.chinese: 一个文件系统必须在被缷载后才可以重新格式化。

sentences.english: The German Emperor took revenge on China by making thinas difficult in the ceremony and propriety.
sentences.chinese: 出于报复心理，德皇在礼仪问题上刁难载沣使团。

sentences.english: Can you give me a lift to the next town? ;
sentences.chinese: 可以顺道载我到下一个镇吗？

sentences.english: Little resistance during operation, capable of starting onload and conveying material at high speed.
sentences.chinese: 运行阻力小，能有载启动，可高速输送物料。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare plasmid DNA-containing liposomes using detergent removal method and investigate the properties of liposomes.
sentences.chinese: 目的用去污剂透析法制备载基因脂质体并考察其性质。

sentences.english: It was the largest temple in the whole country, and the emperor told his men to take me there.
sentences.chinese: 那是全国最大的庙，皇帝叫他的属下把我载到那里。

sentences.english: He needed a  forklift truck to carry it to the official weighing.
sentences.chinese: 他需要用铲车把这颗南瓜载到官方称重地点称重。

sentences.english: It's too serious. Who drive you here?
sentences.chinese: 这么严重，是谁载你来的？

sentences.english: Here’s $500. Please take this group of
sentences.chinese: 这里有五百元，请马上载这些企鹅去动物园。

sentences.english: The balloon-borne radars can virtually act as AWACS themselves, an Air Force official said.
sentences.chinese: 空军官员说，气球载雷达能够扮演预警机本身的角色。

sentences.english: You see three people on a motorcycle and figure there's room for two more.
sentences.chinese: 看到三人共骑机车，会认为还可以载两个人。

sentences.english: Maybe you can get a lift with Dick and Mildred.
sentences.chinese: 或许你可以让迪克和米尔德里德载你一程啊。

sentences.english: The ship put to sea, having a large number of passengers.
sentences.chinese: 该船出了港，载了许多旅客。

sentences.english: Yes, I do. I'll glad to take anybody but Edward.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我乐意载任何人除了爱华德。

definition: to reprint/to repost/to transmit (in writing etc)
in the years of/during those years/period (of dynasty or decade)
then/at once/always/(archaic) luggage rack on a chariot
Imperial Readings of the Taiping Era, general Song dynasty encyclopedia compiled during 977-983 under Li Fang 李昉[Li3 Fang3], 1000 scrolls
to open/to start/to initiate/to enlighten or awaken/to state/to inform
Qi son of Yu the Great 禹[Yu3], reported founder of the Xia Dynasty 夏朝[Xia4 Chao2] (c. 2070-c. 1600 BC)
spring and autumn/four seasons/year/a person's age/annals (used in book titles)
Spring and Autumn Period (770-476 BC)/Spring and Autumn Annals, chronicle of Lu State (722-481 BC)
History of Ten States of South China (1669) by Wu Renchen 吳任臣|吴任臣[Wu2 Ren4 chen2], 114 scrolls
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
